FuncDef:
The map icmp-tranfer enable command enables MAP translation for ICMP and ICMPv6 error packets.
The undo map icmp-tranfer enable command disables MAP translation for ICMP and ICMPv6 error packets.
By default, the function is disabled.
ExtraInfo: To enable MAP translation for ICMP and ICMPv6 error packets, run the map icmp-transfer enable command in the MAP-T instance view.
